name: Mark Davis Pro Bass Challenge
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Compete in various tournaments as you work your way to the top and complete against the fishing master himself, Mark Davis! Strive to improve your ranking as you unlock all the latest tackle equipment.

This version does not support PlayStation®2 peripherals, therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.
